original_text: Blind people went to meet Jesus in the yard of the temple. People who could not walk very well also went there. Jesus caused them all to become well.
korean_text: 맹인과 저는 자들이 성전에서 예수께 나아오매 고쳐주시니

sentences.original_text: Blind people went to meet Jesus
in the yard of the temple
People who could not walk very well
Jesus caused them all to become well
